meanings.definition: A colorless fluid containing white blood cells, that bathes the tissues and drains through the lymphatic system into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent1: The lymph helps fight infections in our body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the lymph to understand how our immune system works.
meanings.sent3: The lymph decided to take a detour through the heart just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed through her like lymph, touching everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The lymph, like a silent warrior, protects us from harm every day.

meanings.definition: A pale yellow fluid that contains white blood cells and bathes the tissues and drains through the lymphatic system into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent1: We learned about the lymph in science class.
meanings.sent2: The lymph carries important cells that help us stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The lymph decided to throw a party in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed through the crowd like lymph, spreading hope and positivity.
meanings.sent5: The lymph, a gentle stream of protection, flows through our bodies.
